historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 9-1102.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary addition of section, see § 1403 of the Fiscal Year 1999 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-401, July 13, 1998, 45 DCR 4794), and § 1403 of the Fiscal Year 1999 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-564, January 12, 1999, 46 DCR 669).

For temporary (90-day) addition of Chapter 11, see notes following § 10-1001.

For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 1012(a) of Fiscal Year 2012 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2011 (D.C. Act 19-93, June 29, 2011, 58 DCR 5599).

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-175, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 10-1001.

For Law 18-115, see notes following § 10-801.

For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 10-1001.

DC CODE § 10-1002

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)
